attributes.action: legislate to have compulsory attendance at school during lunch hour, charging all children for supervision at current dinner money rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1)all children are provided with a free wholesome balanced school meal.
2)children who currently receive 'free dinners' will receive free supervision.
3)allow children to bring a packed lunch
but insist on payment for supervision.
This will result in parents  telling children to eat the school meal rather than provide a packed lunch at EXTRA cost to themselves.
4) the increased revenue from 100% of children will mean BETTER meals are provided.
5) Charge less for two or three siblings (Group rates in effect).
6) Removes schoolchildren from the streets reducing litter problems.
